title.div: The Foodstuffs Suitable for People Intolerant to Gluten (Wales) Regulations 2010 / Rheoliadau Deunyddiau Bwyd sy'n Addas i Bobl ag Anoddefiad tuag at Glwten (Cymru) 2010

div.p: These Regulations, which apply in relation to Wales, provide for the execution and enforcement there of Commission Regulation (EC) No. 41/2009 concerning the composition and labelling of foodstuffs suitable for people intolerant to gluten (OJ No. L16, 21.1.2009, p.3) (“the Commission Regulation”) as read with Article 10(2) of Directive 2009/39/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on foodstuffs intended for particular nutritional uses (OJ No. L124, 20.5.2009, p.21).

Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn, sy'n gymwys o ran Cymru, yn darparu ar gyfer gweithredu a gorfodi yno Reoliad y Comisiwn (EC) Rhif 41/2009 sy'n ymwneud â chyfansoddiad a labelu deunyddiau bwyd sy'n addas i bobl ag anoddefiad tuag at glwten (OJ Rhif L16, 21.1.2009, t.3) (“Rheoliad y Comisiwn”) fel y'i darllenir gydag Erthygl 10(2) o Gyfarwyddeb 2009/39/EC Senedd Ewrop a'r Cyngor ar ddeunyddiau bwyd y bwriedir eu defnyddio at ddibenion maethol penodol (OJ Rhif L124, 20.5.2009, t.21).

entry.title: The Seed Marketing Regulations 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations, which apply in England, implement—

entry.title: The Social Fund (Cold Weather Payments) (General) (Amendment No. 2) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations amend regulation 3 of the Social Fund (Cold Weather Payments) (General) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1988 so that the amount of a cold weather payment will be £25 instead of £8.50.

entry.title: The Departments (Transfer of Functions) Order (Northern Ireland) 2010
entry.summary: This Order transfers functions of the Department of the Environment under section 25(2)(a) of the Northern Ireland (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2006 (c. 33) in relation to the issuing of any strategy or guidance relating to sustainable development to the Office of the First Minister and deputy First Minister.

entry.title: The Social Fund Cold Weather Payments (General) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2010

title.div: The Adult Placement Schemes (Wales) (Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations 2010 / Rheoliadau Cynlluniau Lleoli Oedolion (Cymru) (Diwygiadau Amrywiol) 2010

div.p: These Regulations make two amendments to the Adult Placement Schemes (Wales) Regulations 2004 (“Principal Regulations”).
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn gwneud dau ddiwygiad i Reoliadau Cynlluniau Lleoli Oedolion (Cymru) 2004 (“y Prif Reoliadau”).

entry.title: The Bank Insolvency (Scotland) (Amendment) Rules 2010
entry.summary: These Rules amend the Bank Insolvency (Scotland) Rules 2009 (S.I 2009/351)(the “Rules”) to—

entry.title: The Building Society Insolvency (Scotland) Rules 2010
entry.summary: These Rules set out the procedure for the building society insolvency process under Part 2 of the Banking Act 2009 (as applied to building societies by the Building Societies (Insolvency and Special Administration) Order 2009 (S.I. 2009/805, amended by S.I. 2010/1189).

entry.title: The Bank Administration (Scotland) (Amendment) Rules 2010
entry.summary: These Rules amend the Bank Administration (Scotland) Rules 2009 (S.I. 2009/350) (the “Rules”) as follows—

entry.title: The Bankruptcy (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations make amendments to the Bankruptcy (Scotland) Regulations 2008 (“the 2008 Regulations”) that are consequential on amendments to the Bankruptcy (Scotland) Act 1985 (“the 1985 Act”) made by Part 2 of the Home Owner and Debtor Protection (Scotland) Act 2010. The Regulations also amend the procedure to be followed, and the forms required, in debtor applications under the 1985 Act, and vary the value of vehicles that are exempt from attachment under the Debt Arrangement and Attachment (Scotland) Act 2002 (and hence not part of the assets covered by a sequestration or a protected trust deed).

entry.title: The Seed Potatoes Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations consolidate The Seed Potatoes Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2001 (S.R. 2001 No. 188) as amended by the Seed Potatoes (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2007 (S.R. 2007 No.401), the Seed Potatoes (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2010 (S.R. 2010 No. 7), and include some other minor amendments (listed below).

entry.title: The Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Act 2009 (Commencement No. 3) Order 2010
entry.summary: This Order brings section 23 of the Education (Additional Support for Learning) (Scotland) Act 2009 (“the Act”) into force on 14th November 2010. The whole of the Act will be in force from that date.

title.div: The Child Minding and Day Care (Inspection and Information for Local Authorities) (Wales) Regulations 2010 / Rheoliadau Gwarchod Plant a Gofal Dydd (Arolygu a Gwybodaeth ar gyfer Awdurdodau Lleol)(Cymru) 2010

category.term: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PERSONS, WALES;SOCIAL CARE, WALES
PLANT A PHOBL IFANC,CYMRU;GOFAL CYMDEITHASOL, CYMRU

div.p: These Regulations set out both the arrangements for inspections of those providing child minding and day care and also the information which the Welsh Ministers must provide to a local authority when certain steps are taken.

Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn pennu'r trefniadau ar gyfer arolygiadau o rai sy'n darparu gwarchod plant a gofal dydd i blant, a hefyd yr wybodaeth y mae'n rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru ei darparu i awdurdod lleol pan gymerir camau penodol.

entry.title: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment (No. 2) Regulations 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 (“the principal Regulations”).

entry.title: The Care Leavers (England) Regulations 2010
entry.summary: These Regulations are made under the Children Act 1989 (‘the 1989 Act’) and come into force on 1st April 2011. They revoke, and in part replace, the Children (Leaving Care) (England) Regulations 2001.

entry.title: The Building Society Special Administration (England and Wales) Rules 2010
entry.summary: These Rules set out the procedure for the building society special administration process under Part 3 of the Banking Act 2009 (c.1), as applied in relation to building societies by the Building Societies (Insolvency and Special Administration) Order 2009 (S.I. 2009/805).

entry.title: The Bank Insolvency (England and Wales) (Amendment) Rules 2010

ukm:Subject.Value: BANKS AND BANKING, ENGLAND AND WALES

category.term: BANKS AND BANKING, ENGLAND AND WALES

title.div: The Child Minding and Day Care (Wales) Regulations 2010 / Rheoliadau Gwarchod Plant a Gofal Dydd (Cymru) 2010

category.term: SOCIAL CARE, WALES;CHILDREN AND YOUNG PERSONS, WALES
GOFAL CYMDEITHASOL, CYMRU;PLANT A PHOBL IFANC, CYMRU

div.p: These Regulations revoke and re-enact with modifications the following Regulations—
Mae'r Rheoliadau hyn yn dirymu ac yn ailddeddfu gydag addasiadau y Rheoliadau canlynol—

entry.title: The Bank Administration (England and Wales) (Amendment) Rules 2010
